'''Bertenno''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

[Fassina](/fassina/)'s poor choice of a lover, Bertenno is trying to square his debt with a Rauataian officer by the name of [Hamuto Stoneheel](/hamutoStoneheel/). His choice of wares to purloin, however, is exceptionally poor.
